'''''Deep-Fried... Ice Cream?''''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Challenger: Series X]]''. To complete this achievement, the player must use an exploding [[Flamegranate]] to trigger the [[Melt]] reaction on the [[Gluttonous Yumkasaur Mountain King]].
